useCase.name: Manage Fault Management Job and Report

preconditions.precondition: The Buyer/Client initiates a POST request to create a Fault Management Job.

successEndConditions.condition: The Fault Management Job and Report are successfully managed.

useCase.trigger: Buyer/Client initiates a GET request to retrieve the Fault Management Report.

mainSequence.step: Buyer/Client initiates a POST request to create a Fault Management Job.
Fault Management Job is in progress.
Data is generated for the Fault Management Job.
Fault Management Report is in progress.
Data is collected for the Fault Management Report.
Buyer/Client initiates a GET request to retrieve the Fault Management Report.
Fault Management Report content is returned to the Buyer/Client.
